EmailTemplate.subject: January Direct-TO Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Direct-TO Newsletter January 2015 Issue Go Direct™ Briefing Update: RNP Minima Values on RNAV (GPS) Approaches
An update on what the minimum selection fields on some Flight Management Systems will display when conducting RNAV (GPS) approaches.
Honeywell Pilot Gateway: Latest Updates <http://107.23.57.149/Pilots/Newsletters/2014/January2015/HPGUpdate>
Direct-TO takes a look at some of the content that has been added recently to the Honeywell Pilot Gateway.
Honeywell Support During Superbowl and Phoenix Open <http://107.23.57.149/Pilots/Newsletters/2014/January2015/PHXBowlSupport>
The extended weekend of February 1 promises to be one of the busiest corporate and general aviation fly-ins of any year for the Phoenix “Valley of the Sun” metropolitan area.
SIL Briefing: ETE to Next Waypoint Display <http://107.23.57.149/Pilots/Newsletters/2014/January2015/SILBriefETE>
Honeywell Aerospace has issued a Service Information Letter (SIL) for certain aircraft equipped with the SPZ-8000, Primus 1000, and Primus 2000.
Global Data Center Update: WSI Weather <http://107.23.57.149/Pilots/Newsletters/2014/January2015/MyGDCAppWSI>
The Global Data Center and WSI have teamed up to bring enhanced weather products and coverage to MyGDC iPad App Version 3.3.
Learn More <http://goaero.honeywell.com/O0i0g8gX0200ZQqE0i0G24I>
Technical Publications, Videos, news, events, and other resources for pilots can now be found on the new Honeywell Pilot Gateway. Click Here <http://goaero.honeywell.com/O0i0g8gX0200ZQqE0i0G24I> to get started.
